item.title: University
item.description: All courses I’ve taken up until now at university. MSc Nano-engineering Semester 1 Mechanics Quantum Physics 1 Quantum Physics 2 Semiconductor Devices Semiconductor Physics Materials Physics and Technology for Nanoelectronics Nanostructured Bio-Macromolecules Waivered: Applied linear algebra and differential equations Semester 2 Atom theory, chemical periodicity, and chemical bonding Electricity, magnetism, and waves Projectwork nanotechnology, nanoengineering and nanoscience Technology of integrated systems Chemistry on the nanometer scale Quantum information and introduction to quantum computation Exempted
